MicrobitExplorer.all_comments_and_blank_: All comments and blank lines have been removed.
MicrobitExplorer.error_unable_to_send_fi: Error: Unable to send « {0} » to micro:bit.
MicrobitExplorer.file_fileshort_is_now_o: File « {0} » is now on micro:bit « {1} » on {2}
MicrobitExplorer.micro_bit_is_connected_: micro:bit is connected and trying to list files
MicrobitExplorer.selected_file_must_be_a: Selected file must be a "py" file
MicrobitExplorer.warning_file_nomfichier: Warning ! File {0} already exists, do you want to overwrite it.
package.force_the_python_stub_to_english: Force the python stubs to english.
package.forces_saving_the_file_before_up: Forces saving the file before uploading it to the microbit.
package.micro_bit_-_send_this_file_-_wit: ⬇️ micro:bit - Send this file - without comment and empty lines - to micro:bit
package.micro_bit_-_send_this_file_to_mi: ⤵️ micro:bit - Send this file to micro:bit
package.micro_bit_-_upload_current_file_: micro:bit - Upload current file in main.py on micro:bit
package.plug_in_a_micro_bit_card_and_cli: Plug in a micro:bit card and click below to view its contents, download or delete files.\n[Connect to micro:bit](command:microbit.connectEntry)
package.specifies_the_selected_micro_bit: Specifies the selected micro:bit COM port.
package.suppress_comments_and_empty_line: Suppress comments and empty lines when file is sent to micro:bit. Warning : the line number returned by the error is then false.
